physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 4 x 5 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On envelope: ''#101 Group of pictures of Trinidad Cemetery''. On photograph: "Jaffa Family tombstones in Trinidad Jewish Cemetery [sic] 1976, donor: Paul May, #101."

mods.abstract: Three smaller tombstones in front of a larger tombstone with the name Jaffa in the Jewish Cemetery in Trinidad, Colorado. One of the small stones is illegible the others say "Amelia Jaffa, Born June 13, 1845, Died Aug 6, 1921, [Hebrew word]." and "Dr Perry Jaffa, Jan 26, 1867, Nov 2, 1915."
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance. Please credit Roger Whitacre.
